# Geocoding

```{r}
political <- shapefile("Barrio_Vereda/Barrio_Vereda.shp")

leaflet(data = political) %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$OpenStreetMap) %>% 
  addPolygons(fill = TRUE, stroke = TRUE, color = "#03F") %>% addLegend("bottomright", colors = "#03F", labels = "Barrios y veredas")
```
